thread.section_title: The News International: Latest News Breaking, Pakistan News
thread.title: Follow the law

author: News Desk
title: Follow the law
text: For a country with a written constitution and laws, judgments must be strictly based on written laws. Pakistan has suffered since the first time the doctrine of necessity was used to justify the dissolution and of parliament. It is time that our superior judiciary strictly pass judgments in accordance with the written law and constitution. Supremacy and sanctity of the constitution must prevail. After all, this is a democratic country where rule of law must matter. Malik Tariq Ali Lahore This letter refers to the article ‘Unthinkable thoughts’ dated June 2, 2024.
